duties_responsibilities.duty: Support overall delivery services to major multinational clients and play a critical role in growing and retaining Global Benefits Management (GBM) clients.
Contribute to sales pursuit activities and daily client communications regarding services and health consulting as it applies to GBM services.
Act as the liaison between stakeholders and cross-functional consulting teams, deliver GBM services, and achieve successful business outcomes.
Participate in finalist meetings and sales presentations as the GBM Subject Matter Expert.
Handle the implementation of large GBM appointments and ensure local services are delivered in accordance with global mandates.
Monitor employee benefit programs globally and provide aggregated reporting to ensure governance, consistency, and cost-effective solutions.
Execute the business’ ongoing global benefit strategy and global benefit financing strategy.
Design and develop the “GBM Rules of the Road” governance framework and ensure services are in line with it and Service Level Agreements.
Provide ongoing support and coaching to junior GBM team members and local brokerage teams, and contribute to their training and development.
Collaborate with all members of the client team to influence delivery and ensure that all service commitments to the client are met.
Proactively look for process improvements to grow the GBM book and retain GBM clients.
Review and assess escalations and provide resolutions as appropriate, understand and translate analysis to clients and team members, and flag when not in compliance with the client contract.
Responsible for awareness of client profitability and work to increase profitability, as well as develop an area of expertise to serve as a resource for team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent in Business Administration, Management, or a related field plus (5) years of progressive post-baccalaureate experience in the position offered, International Benefits Manager or a related position.
